content: learn how to create this cute mini bunny amigurumi keychain with this free bunny crochet pattern this is an easy to crochet pattern perfect for beginners it is also very quick to make takes about 1 hour you can use any yarn to make it i made a small keychain mini bunny from sport weight cotton yarn and a bigger bunny with chenille super bulky plush yarn the pattern has a full video included on how to make this cute bunny amigurumi link to written pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-bunny-crochet-pattern/ link to video https //youtu be/dwqkqla1kg4
